entries: Dwarven spirits gravitate toward this relic, and you can call upon them to inhabit you and your allies to impart ancestral secrets. When you gain this gift, choose three {@filter common 1st-level dwarf ancestry feats|feats||type=ancestry|Level=[1]|ancestry & heritage=dwarf|rarity=common}.
Select one of the three ancestry feats. You and each ally in a 10-foot-radius burst centered on you gain that feat and the {@trait dwarf} trait for 1 minute.
